subNode:value.scalar:string: When active, all shopping features will be disabled.
Set the maximum number of products that can be selected for comparison.
Set to "0" to disable this feature.
Number of days for which the product is considered 'new'
Redirect after adding product to cart
Only for non-AJAX versions of the cart.
Set the maximum size of product short description (in characters).
Number of products displayed per page. Default is 10.
The order in which products are displayed in the product list.
Default order method for product list
Display available quantities on the product page
Display remaining quantities when the qty is lower than
Set to "0" to disable this feature.
Enable JqZoom instead of Thickbox on the product page
Display unavailable product attributes on the product page
Display the "add to cart" button when a product has attributes
Display or hide the "add to cart" button on category pages for products that have attributes forcing customers to see product details.
Add to cart button is hidden when a product is unavailable
Allows you to manage physical stock, warehouses and supply orders.

scalar:array.comment: // if advanced stock management is disabled, updates concerned tables
